name: Nidoking

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage plus Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

modifier.note: Double poison damage instead of standard 10

flavorText: Uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break its prey's bones.

strengths: Toxic deals 20 poison damage per turn - double normal
Thrash can deal 40 damage on heads
counters: Scoop Up - Returns Poisoned Pokemon to hand

competitiveHistory: Nidoking saw limited competitive play due to its Stage 2 requirement and Psychic weakness. However, Toxic's enhanced poison damage made it a unique threat that could punish slow, defensive strategies. It was more popular in casual play.

rulings.ruling: Toxic's enhanced Poison (20 damage) replaces normal Poison damage. The Pokemon takes 20 damage after each player's turn.
If a Pokemon already Poisoned by Toxic is Poisoned again by a normal Poison attack, it goes back to taking 10 damage.
